sentence.Network_en: His equivocal response has done nothing to dampen the speculation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他模棱两可的回应丝毫没有消除人们的猜疑。

sentence.Network_en: Nothing seems to dampen his perpetual enthusiasm.
sentence.Network_cn: 似乎没有什么能让他那持久的热情消退。

sentence.Network_en: Don't dampen the enthusiasm of the masses.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要损伤大家的积极性.

entry.tran: 降低，减弱，抑制(热情、激动等)
entry.def: To dampen something such as someone's enthusiasm or excitement means to make it less lively or intense.

example.ex: Nothing seems to dampen his perpetual enthusiasm...
example.tran: 似乎没有什么能让他那持久的热情消退。

example.ex: I hate to dampen your spirits but aren't you overlooking a couple of minor points.
example.tran: 我不想扫你的兴，但你是否忽视了几个小的问题呢？

entry.def: If you dampen something, you make it slightly wet.

example.ex: She took the time to dampen a washcloth and do her face.
example.tran: 她花了点时间弄湿毛巾，洗了把脸。

means.word_mean: 3. deaden (a sound or noise), especially by wrapping
4. reduce the amplitude (of oscillations or waves)
5. make vague or obscure or make (an image) less visible;

auth_sentence.content: Even a sax solo can't dampen the exuberance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even a sax solo can't dampen the exuberance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even a sax solo can't dampen the exuberance.

auth_sentence.content: Last night officials tried to dampen speculation about the rates.
auth_sentence.res_content: Last night officials tried to dampen speculation about the rates.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last night officials tried to dampen speculation about the rates.

auth_sentence.content: Dampen with another two tablespoons of liqueur.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dampen with another two tablespoons of liqueur.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒

dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐

wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒

sentences.en: The rain hardly dampened the ground.
sentences.cn: 这场雨连地面也没有打湿。
